message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper discusses continual learning with neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the broad category of machine learning. The paper specifically focuses on Bayesian approaches to learning the structure of deep neural networks for continual learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.CV (Computer Vision) since these sub-categories often deal with neural networks and deep learning. The paper also mentions unsupervised learning, which falls under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and supervised learning, which falls under cs.CL (Computation and Language).
